item.description:
April 26, 2012

 

HI! My friends,

Good Morning! We continue to be grateful for this beautiful weather.  I trust this note finds you and yours well. Sorry for this belated reminder, but I was away in NJ for a week long meeting.  We chose our US provincial superior (coordinator) and discern the way to move in the next four years. Happy to let you know that Fr. Carl has been re-elected. Keep him and all of us in your prayers. Thanks!

With this note, I also want to let you know that our upcoming Interfaith Book Club is already here. Mark your calendars:


TIME: April 29, 2012 - 4:00pm

PLACE: At the PEACE ABBEY: Two North Main Street, Sherborn, MA

BOOK:  Mystics, Masters, Saints and Sages: Stories  Enlightenment by Robert Ullman and Judyth Reichenberg - Ullman. Sharing on pages 123-145.

Six people came to our last meeting and some of the sharing was:

"You see, we have to realize the Truth non merely for our won sakes, but we must see that by our contact and influence, other also get a push towards the realization of God. It is not enough if we enjoy peace ourselves, but we must share it also with others." (Swami Papa Ramdas)

"You think you are a body subject to birth, decay,disease and death though you are the immortal changeless Spirit." (Swami Papa Ramdas)

"Lead me from unreal to the Real, lead me from darkness to Light, lead me from death to Immortality." (Swami Papa Ramdas)

"No, of course not! Wrath springs only from thwarted desires. I do not expect anything from others, so their actions cannot be in opposition to wishes of mind. I would not use you for my own ends; I am happy only in you worn true happiness." (Paramahansa Yogananda)

"I fetched a broom; Master, I knew, was teaching me the secret of balanced living." (Paramahansa Yogananda)

"The Lord has created all from the illimitable joy of His being. Though they are painfully camped by the body, God nevertheless expects that men - women made in His image shall ultimately rise above all sense identifications and reunite with Him." (Paramahansa Yogananda)

Hope you can make our April 29th, meeting. May Heaven continue to bless you and yours.

Fr. Joe
Xaverian Missionaries
item.name: APRIL 29, 2012 MEETING
